content: --चंदनः --नं {1} a kind of yellow sandal (the wood or tree); <ls>R. 3. 59</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 60</ls>; <ls>Ś. 7. 2</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 69.</ls> {2} one of the five trees of paradise; पंचैते देवतरवो मंदारः पारिजातकः . संतानः कल्पवृक्षश्च पुंसि वा हरिचंदनं <ls>Ak.</ls> (--नं . {1} moonlight. {2} saffron. {3} the filament of a lotus.
